Breakfast Burrito.name: Breakfast Burrito
ingredients: 1 quarter of a cup of shredded cheddar cheese
instructions: Turn an oven on to 400 degrees Fahrenheit
Right afterwards, add the 2 strips of bacon into the oven and cook until desired doneness
Heat a pan up to medium heat, then add in chorizo
Cook chorizo on pan for 15-20 minutes
Remove the chorizo from the pan
Dice up quarter of an onion
Add to saucepan and keep on medium heat for 5 minutes
Bring saucepan down to low heat
Add eggs to saucepan with onions and continuously mix the eggs
Once the eggs are set but still slightly watery, remove from saucepan
Cook the 6 tater tots by following instructions on the bag
Place the tortilla on a plate
Spread sour cream all over the tortilla
Add tater tots, eggs, cheddar cheese, chorizo, and bacon to tortilla
cooking tips: Put bacon into cold oven before heating
For soft scrambled eggs, constantly stir eggs with a spatula
Add jalapeno to eggs or hot sauce to burrito to increase the spiciness
Cook the onions in the rendered chorizo fat

Tater Tots: French fries and other fried white potatoes

queries.Egg: Eggs, Grade A, Large, egg whole
